title.rendered: The Manifest Spotlights EZ Rankings as Vancouver’s Best Reviewed B2B Partner in 2022

content.rendered:
With over a decade of experience in the digital marketing arena, we at EZ Rankings, are a tried and tested partner that offers a vast array of solutions to help leverage your business. From search engine optimization to website designing, our team is passionate about identifying potential competitive advantages and harnessing them to allow your business to grow. We thrive in great relationships. For us, seeing our clients satisfied and successful gives us an unbeatable feeling.

Today, we’re extremely proud to announce and celebrate with you our newest industry recognition. During the inaugural The Manifest Company Awards for Canada, EZ Rankings was officially honored among Vancouver’s best-reviewed and recommended B2B leaders! According to their latest research, our team is a trusted partner for PPC, SMM, local SEO, and SEO services this 2022!

Throughout the years, we’ve served more than 10,000 brilliant clients from 32 different countries. The exciting projects they’ve entrusted us with and their amazing support helped us at EZ Rankings to become the leaders that we are today.

Moreover, The Manifest is a B2B platform and resource that publishes a range of data-driven content such as agency shortlists, market reports, and step-by-step guides. Their inaugural industry recognition celebrates the stellar relationships shared by the top service providers with their clients. Each awardee was selected based on the quantity of testimonials and endorsements they’ve earned over the past twelve months.

It’s only right that we give credit to whomever credit is due — this award was made possible by all of our amazing clients and hard-working teammates. Thank you so much for putting your trust in EZ Rankings! 

With great accolades comes great responsibilities. Rest assured that we will continue to uphold the highest standards for our services and solutions.

Increase your sales with impactful digital marketing solutions. Work with EZ Rankings and hit the ground running. Connect with us and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can.
